subject: Taxes
description_text:
Hello!
I would like to order simsonn pro plus 3H pedals in Lithuania. Question is, how much taxes I should pay additionally receiving an order?
Thank you:)

conversations.body_text: Hi Vikacharkevic,    Please feel free to order, we will ship from our warehouse in Germany without taxes.

Oh, thank you so much!!❤️
Sent from my iPhone

>

Hi Vikacharkevic,  We don't have the upgraded version of the Pro Plus in our German warehouse anymore, we upgraded you to the Plus X pedal for free. But sorry, our warehouse is missing the black base plate, we send you the black pedal + silver base plate, if you want to change to the silver pedal + silver base plate, please let me know as soon as possible.

Hey, it’s okay to have black+silver, thank you. Should I reorder pedals or It’s OK to leave same order?

Also, maybe can you please explain what’s the main difference between Pro Plus and Plus X? Is Plus X model better at some point, maybe It feels more realistic when using simulator? 
I making a gift for my boyfriend, so It’s good to know what difference is between those two variants

Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Vikacharkevic,    The Plus X is the ultimate upgrade to the Pro Plus, with the main upgrades being the elastomers and hydraulics for the brakes, and the pedal material.

Yes, sounds like a good option. Thank you!



>

Hey, I just noticed that i’ve received a discount code this night. I should notice this before placing an order. Maybe can we close existing one and I will make a new payment for Plus X using this discount?
But if it’s too late to change something, let’s leave it as it is :)



>
Hi Vikacharkevic,    Sorry, the discount can no longer be applied to your order, thank you for your understanding.
